vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time before the Flood, first mentioned at Gen.4.2;
son of: Adam (H0121) and Eve (H2332);
brother of: Cain (H7014B) and Seth (H8352)
Also named: Abel<\i> (Ἄβελ "Abel" G0006)
§ Abel = "breath"
second son of Adam and Eve, killed by his brother Cain
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞伯 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "呼吸"
亞當和夏娃的第二個兒子, 被他的兄弟該隱所殺
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚伯 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "呼吸"
亚当和夏娃的第二个儿子, 被他的兄弟该隐所杀
